definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Usually pot Brewing is putting the soup, or frying.
sentences.chinese: 通常煮法是放湯，或炒制。

sentences.english: These vegetables can be cooked in several different ways.
sentences.chinese: 這些蔬菜有很多種煮法。

sentences.english: There are various ways of cooking eggs.
The CORRECT method is to cook the noodles this way.
sentences.chinese: 以下是快熟面的正確煮法。

sentences.english: Thereare various ways of cooking an egg.
sentences.chinese: 雞蛋有各種各樣的煮法。

definition: way of eating/how something is eaten/how a dish is prepared/the way a dish is to be cooked
ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
(dialect) to cook in salt or sand, inside a sealed pot/to steam/to bake
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to cook slowly over a low flame/pot/saucepan
